assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Luminescence Technology Corp. manufactures and sells organic chemicals in North America, Europe, Asia, and Taiwan. It offers organic light emitting diode (OLED) materials, thermally activated delayed fluorescent (TADF), and small molecular and polymer solution processed OLED materials; organic photovoltaic (OPV) materials, including small molecular/oligomer, polymer, hole/electron transport, self-assembled monolayers, perovskite solar cells, and dye-sensitized solar cell materials; and organic photodiodes (OPD), and perovskite-based photodiodes (PPD). The company also provides organic thin-film transistor (OTFT) and organic field-effect transistor (OFET); flexible printed electronics, such as OPV, OTFT/OFET, hole transport and injection layer, host layer, the light-emitting layer, and electron transport/hole blocking layer polymers; photonic and optical device materials that consist of porphyrins, phthalocyanines, and dyes; and quantum dot materials. In addition, it offers synthetic intermediates and reagents comprising arylamines, naphthalenes, anthracenes, fluorenes, pyrenes/triphenylenes/chrysenes, carbazole derivatives, heterocyclics, iridium complexes/ligands, silane derivatives, thiophene derivatives, benzene derivatives, boronic acids/ boronic esters, metal catalysts/reductants, and other products; polymide; aggregation induced emission; organic electrode; material organic frameworks/covalent organic frameworks; photoresist materials; and bioscience materials that include pharmaceutical intermediates, inhibitor, Chinese medicine reference reagents, nucleosides, nucleotides and nucleic acids, and metal catalysts/reductants. Further, the company provides substrate and encapsulation materials, evaporation parts, and OLED panels and drivers, as well as equipment for the rapid drying process, coating process, UV light process, and OLED and OPV measurement. Luminescence Technology Corp. was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
